description:
My apartment is close to Prospect Park, the F and G trains subway, Barbès, Colson Patisserie, the 9th st YMCA. It's bright, quiet, kid-friendly -- a perfect place to spend the Easter holidays. Cable-TV, fast-wifi, washer-dryer included. Ideally looking for someone to take property from April 7-28, since I will be in Cuba then.

All rooms in the apartment.

Park Slope is one of the most fun and safe neighborhoods in NYC.

Very close to the F and G trains (Seventh avenue stop), which means Manhattan is only 15-20 mins away.
name: Bright, quiet 2-bed apt in prime Park Slope
review: Beautiful place equipped with all amenities and in the center of everthing and just minutes away from the subway , restaurants and stores. Sebastian is a great host. Highly recommended.
